title: Enhance panicindex and panicslice to report more useful info
body:
RFE:

It would be useful (following in the tradition of Google Guice) if 
panicindex and panicslice could be extended with parameters so that the 
index and slice bounds can be reported when the panic occurs, making 
postmortem debugging easier.

E.g, it's much more useful to see:

index 10 out of range [0,9]
slice bounds [10:20] out of range [0,19]

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

release.2010-05-04
